text:
@realDonaldTrump @foxandfriends @CNN This, this 100% insignificant unimportant shit is what you pay attention to. 
You have killed 127K+ Americans w/your #COVID19 response failure.
You let Putin pay bounties on American soldiers and lied about knowing.
You cost 40+ million Americans their jobs.
And it's ratings?
